pages.text: $(li)The Protection enchantment can be applied in any kind of Helmet, Chestplate, Leggins, Boots, $(l:patchouli:weapons/shield)Shields$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/leather_horse_armor)Horse Armors$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:pets/revamped_wolf/leather_wolf_armor)Wolf Armors$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment reduces the receive damage from most sources.
pages.title: Protection

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level IV.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level V of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_protection)Ancient Tome (Protection)$(/l).
